scripts.format: pnpm --filter ./crates/bindings-typescript run format && pnpm --filter ./docs run format && pnpm --filter ./sdks/typescript run format
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter ./crates/bindings-typescript run lint && pnpm --filter ./docs run lint && pnpm --filter ./sdks/typescript run lint
scripts.build: pnpm --filter ./crates/bindings-typescript run build && pnpm --filter ./docs run build && pnpm --filter ./sdks/typescript run build
scripts.test: pnpm --filter ./crates/bindings-typescript run test && pnpm --filter ./docs run test && pnpm --filter ./sdks/typescript run test
scripts.generate: pnpm --filter ./crates/bindings-typescript run generate && pnpm --filter ./docs run generate && pnpm --filter ./sdks/typescript run generate
